On June 29, in Suzhou, Jiangsu, a man attempted suicide on the rooftop, and passers-by downstairs started to jeer and insult him: If you don't jump, you are not a human being.
In the end, the man jumped to his death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Multiple pictures] Netizen submission
A victim of fake porn wanted me to publish his experience
On the night of May 12, he was blackmailed for 200,000 yuan overnight because he added a fake porn telegram.
I hope to use my own experience to remind everyone not to follow in his footsteps

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After establishing the initial contact, they quickly begin to build trust with caring attitudes, making the victim feel as if they are really in love.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Then he began to tease the victim with words to induce her to take his video.
After getting the victim's video, he immediately revealed his true intentions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Immediately after that, the victim is threatened, and asked to decide within 10 seconds whether to deal with it or not, and to come back within one minute. The threat of a short time limit is used to make the victim give up thinking and finally compromise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the extortion process, the victim thought that paying 6,000 yuan at a time would save him from financial trouble, but he was extorted back and forth by two people, who transferred 200,000 yuan in succession and even borrowed all his online loans. It was not until he arrived at the police station that the police stopped him from transferring money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After that, the victim's bank card was also frozen by the Anti-Fraud Center.

On June 30, the sign of a law enforcement brigade in Zhenping County, Ankang City, Shaanxi Province was maliciously painted and changed to "Law Enforcement Dog Team".
A large number of netizens in the comment area boycotted this behavior, believing that animals should not be insulted.

name: 李老师不是你老师

On the afternoon of June 30, a knife stabbing incident occurred at the high-speed railway station in Houma City, Shanxi Province. A man and a woman were stabbed. The stabber was a man. After stabbing two people, he was subdued by the security guards on the scene.
There is no answer to how the knife successfully passed the security check.
